(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This) (NNP Stall))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (VBN Closed)
        (SBAR (RB Just) (IN while)
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (VBP are)
              (ADVP (RB still))
              (VP (VBG thinking)
                (PP (IN about)
                  (S
                    (VP (VBG going)
                      (PRT (RP down))
                      (PP (TO to)
                        (NP
                          (NP (NNP Ya) (NNP Kwang))
                          (PP (IN for)
                            (NP (DT the) (NNP Lobster) (NNPS Noodles))))))))))))))
    (, ,)))


det(Stall-2, This-1)
nsubjpass(Closed-4, Stall-2)
auxpass(Closed-4, is-3)
root(ROOT-0, Closed-4)
advmod(thinking-10, Just-5)
mark(thinking-10, while-6)
nsubj(thinking-10, you-7)
aux(thinking-10, are-8)
advmod(thinking-10, still-9)
ccomp(Closed-4, thinking-10)
prep(thinking-10, about-11)
pcomp(about-11, going-12)
prt(going-12, down-13)
prep(going-12, to-14)
nn(Kwang-16, Ya-15)
pobj(to-14, Kwang-16)
prep(Kwang-16, for-17)
det(Noodles-20, the-18)
nn(Noodles-20, Lobster-19)
pobj(for-17, Noodles-20)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB let)
      (NP (PRP me))
      (ADVP (RB just))
      (VP (VB throw)
        (NP (CD one) (JJR more) (NN dish))
        (PP (IN into)
          (NP
            (NP (PRP$ your) (NN list))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (JJ Must) (JJ Try) (NNS dishes)))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (S

      (VP (VBD asked)

            (VP (VBD was)

              (PP (IN on)

      (NP (PRP he))
      (VP

          (PP (IN by) (IN with)
            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (NN bucket))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (NNP Mussels))))))
        (CC and)
        (VP (VBD said)
          (SBAR
            (S
              (NP (PRP he))
              (VP (MD could)
                (VP (VB try)
                  (S
                    (VP (VBG whipping)
                      (PRT (RP up))
                      (NP (DT a) (JJ noodle) (NN dish))
                      (PP (IN with)
                        (NP (PRP it))))))))))))
    (. .)))
